content.rendered:
The Genoa Bar Stool. Made with a steel frame and a beech veneer frame.

Available in a range of finishes to suit your style & taste. Perfect for busy commercial venues such as restaurants, bars & coffee shops but also suitable for any environment where strength & integrity is key.

Held in stock for delivery in 3-4 working days. 1 Year guarantee.

This item requires basic self assembly
